entry.content:
Carbon Forwards is a visionary new asset class for the Voluntary Carbon Markets (VCM), that enable companies to buy carbon credits of future carbon removal projects. Our focus on carbon removal projects is to increase the impact we have on slowing down climate change.

To create Carbon Forwards CARBEXC has developed partnerships and is developing a unique certification process that involves satellite imagery, drones and IoT devices to track the projects.

Providing ROI while funding carbon removal projects.

Buy, sell and trade carbon credit futures and help organizations making an impact towards the betterment of our planet and our species with high impact nature-based solutions.

Not just reducing carbon emissions. No - that’s cutting corners and isn’t enough. We catalyze carbon removal projects, to remove carbon out of the atmosphere for 2x impact.

PARTNERSHIPS
We are partnering with leaders of carbon removal projects and are always looking for new partners.

Mangroves Blue Carbon with Vlinder

Mangrove forests sequester up to five times more carbon dioxide from the atmosphere than other types of forest.

 

Hemp Green Carbon with Signara Global Solutions


Hemp is one of the fastest converting CO2-to-biomass tools available today; proved more efficient than agro-forestry (European Industrial Hemp Association)

 

Educating Children with Take Action Global


Over two million children are earning carbon credits by learning and then teaching about harvesting carbon.

 

CERTIFICATION
Providing legitimacy, trading liquidity and funding opportunities to carbon removal projects

Carbon Removal projects are strenuous for suppliers to deliver. They are scarce and overlooked because of their relative difficulty.

Our certification process is being developed with transparency, accuracy and the latest technologies. 

Our objective is to offer project developers or farmers the ability to track their land and projects via their phone and will offer buyers aggregated data taken from satellite imagery, drones and IoT devices.

TRANSPARENCY & CONFIDENCE
On the Carbon Credit Price and the quality of carbon credits.

ACCESSIBILITY 
Easy to understand, simple to sign up and trade and low admission and registration fees.

OPPORTUNITY
A global integrated carbon credit market with abundant investable instruments, e.g. spots futures and removal.

The Global Carbon Marketplace

For companies to purchase carbon credits and futures to offset their greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions. 

For investors to easily access a new and rapidly growing asset class on a transparent, fast and secure online exchange.  

For suppliers of carbon credits to certify and sell carbon credits and futures and fund carbon credit generating projects.

THE PROBLEM 

SCIENCE

Within the next 2 decades, global temperatures are likely to rise 1.5 degrees Celsius.

The 7 warmest years in the 1880-2020 record have all occurred since 2014.

PEOPLE

800 million people are vulnerable to climate change impacts, such as droughts, floods, heat waves, extreme weather events and rising sea-levels (UN, 2021).

BIODIVERSITY

More than 1 million species are at risk of extinction by climate change (National Geographic, May 2019). 

THE OPPORTUNITY

CONSUMERS are demanding accountability 

34% consumers reported having ‘Chosen brands that have environmentally sustainable practices/ values’ (Deloitte, Mar 2021).

BUSINESSES’ demand for carbon Net-Zero solutions is exploding

6x companies joined The Climate Pledge for Net-Zero in 2021 (The Climate Pledge, Dec 2021)

GOVERNMENTS are enforcing climate change actions

The EU, US, China, India and other governments are implementing climate accountability legislation (European Commision 2021, The White House, January 2021, Reuters, October 2021, BBC, November 2021)
